settings.text:
Got a question? Send a message below or at embracelife@ecoaya.com. We ask that you please note the main reason for reaching out in the subject line. We tend to respond quicker if we know the email is urgent.‎

We respond to emails and messages Monday through Friday, between 8:00 AM and 6:30 PM Eastern Time (ET).

<style>
p{

}

}
}
</style>

custom_css: .contact-form input.full,.contact-form textarea.full,.contact-form select.full {border: 0.1px solid #2b3537; padding: 10px; box-sizing: border-box;}
